school.name: Chartered Institute of Environmental Health, London, UK

education.field_of_study: Water Quality and Wastewater Treatment Management

profile_positions.title: Medical Advisor
OH & HS Manager

profile_positions.description:
- managing implementation and communication of the company's quality strategy, policy, objectives, quality assurance, control, planning, improvement and programs throughout the function regionally. support the implementation of the Quality Management program in the regional function and ensure alignment of regional function QM with goals and with Global Quality objectives
- interface with the Regional functional stakeholders and with teams critical for quality management in the function
- ensure QM practices in the function are integrated, optimized, and verified for processes that impinge on product quality, performance, purity, and business-related risks
oversee the documentation, implementation, and validation of Business processes through appropriate auditing programs. ensure alignment of function QM systems with Global QM standards;
- ensure appropriate Quality management support to compile and report Regional quality Key performance Indicators (KPIs) and support to support Quality Risk assessment of the function
profile_positions.title: Regional Quality Manager
Quality Assurance Manager

profile_positions.description:
- supervising administrative staff.
- managing systems for conducting patient intake, pre-screening, triaging, treatment prioritizing, scheduling, releasing of patient dental records as requested and outside referrals.
- administering the operations of the dental software program and associated subprograms (i.e. patient charting, radiography, billing)
- maintaining inventory of dental equipment and supplies and coordinating equipment cleaning, sanitation, maintenance, repairs and inspections.
- providing outstanding customer service to the patient community with the goal to achieve no patient complaints.
- coordinating oral hygiene education to all dental clinic patients in cooperation with staff dentist, hygienist and volunteer dentist, hygienist.
- developing and sustaining relationships with MediClub dentists and the dental community throughout the region and international.
- improving and implement external marketing plan including all external communications and publicity.
- administering internal marketing procedures, including referral gifts, new patient thank you cards, long term letters, post operative phone calls, etc.
- ensuring compliance with OSHA other applicable local, state and federal regulations.
- ensuring the proper organization and filing of all corporate documents and records of the Association, and the timely submission of reports and fees to government agencies, funding sources, etc.
- developing and implementing, in conjunction with the Company Management, program procedures outlining in detail the responsibilities, operational features and objectives of the dental health program.
profile_positions.title: General Manager
QA/QC Manager
Medical Doctor at IPA-1, BTC Pipeline Project (BP/BTC/Petrofac Int.)
Medical Doctor at PSA-2 BTC Pipeline Project (BP/BTC/Petrofac Int.)

profile_positions.description:
- verifying patient information by interviewing patient; recording medical history; confirming purpose of visit.
- preparing patients for examination by performing preliminary physical tests; taking blood pressure, weight, and temperature; reporting patient history summary.
- counsulting patients by transmitting physician's orders and questions about surgery in MediClub center.
- scheduling of Specialists consultations by making arrangements with the MediClub center; verifying times with patients; preparing charts, pre-admission and consent forms.
- providing ambulating, turning, and positioning patients;
- Providing adjunct care by administering enemas, douches, nonsterile dressings, surgical preps, ice packs, heat treatments, therapeutic baths; applying restraints.
- Maintaining patient stability by checking vital signs and weight; testing urine; recording intake and output information.
- providing patient comfort by utilizing resources and materials; transporting patients; answering patients' call lights and requests; reporting observations of the patient to nursing supervisor.
- keeping supplies ready by inventorying stock; placing orders; verifying receipt.
- keeping equipment operating by following operating instructions; troubleshooting breakdowns; maintaining supplies; performing preventive maintenance.
- documents actions by completing forms, reports, logs, and records.
profile_positions.title: Medical Assistant of SPS Camp Clinic (BP/BTC/CCC)
